title: LLM Fine-Tuning & RAG System
description: Architected end-to-end QA system using BERT/RoBERTa. Implemented LoRA/QLoRA for 4x memory reduction and engineered semantic retrieval pipelines achieving 85%+ accuracy.

title: Demand Forecasting Pipeline
description: Built production-grade forecasting system for 100K+ daily transactions. Developed hybrid modeling approach combining Deep Learning (GRU, LSTM, Transformer) and Gradient Boosting.

title: RL for Visual Reasoning
description: Developed novel deep reinforcement learning agent for complex spatial reasoning. Implemented vision-based NN architecture with CNNs and recurrent layers for temporal reasoning.
